snippet: Assemblyman Steven F. McLaughlin compared Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s push for quick action on gun limits to Hitler’s and Mussolini’s dictatorships, but later apologized.
abstract: New York State Republican assemblyman Steven F McLaughlin compares Gov Andrew M Cuomo’s push for quick action on gun limits to dictatorships of Hitler and Mussolini; statement is immediately rejected by legislative leaders of both parties and he later apologizes.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Steven F. McLaughlin compared Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s push for quick action on gun limits to Hitler’s and Mussolini’s dictatorships, but later apologized.

headline.seo: Lawmaker Compares Cuomo’s Law-Making Methods to Hitler’s
headline.main: Cuomo Acted Like Hitler in Gun Push, Official Says
headline.print_headline: In Gun Push, Official Says, Cuomo Acted Like Hitler
